feedback:
Good attempt at Pataka! You're on the right track. Here's what to focus on:

**What to adjust:**
• The thumb needs to be pressed more closely against the side of your palm. Think of it as gently hugging the palm.
• Try to get all five fingers closer to one another so they are aligned and parallel.

**You're doing well:**
• Your fingers are straight, which is a great start for this mudra!

Keep practicing - you're making progress!
